ygData.subject: RE: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: If its a level 50 mob, my guess would be the dinosaur in OOT. It would have to be a little camped level 50 and this is the only one I can think of, unless the
ygData.messageBody:
If its a level 50 mob, my guess would be the dinosaur in OOT.

It would have to be a little camped level 50 and this is the only one I can
think of, unless the big shark in Lake Rathe is level 50. I would look
toward big mobs that have no know special drop.

-hax

> > OK don't get to excited but I have been asked by a
> > fellow gnome to make
> > the gemcutter. He claims he can get the diamond dust
> > for me, but won't
> > give up the npc that drops it. He claims that the
> > npc is 50th level and
> > that the diamond dust is a rare drop item off it. I
> > am thinking that this
